name: Pop & Rest
slogan: London's premier startup providing sleep & meditation pods. Book by the hour to recharge
description:
Pop & Rest is a tech-enabled wellbeing travel startup based in the vibrant Silicon Roundabout in London. 

We connect people in large cities with peaceful and private sleep & meditation pods allowing them to  disconnect from busy places such as business districts, train stations and airports. Our single-occupancy pods are booked by the hour and controlled from our app. Using the app, users are able to personalise their experience through music, lighting and ambient sound.

Our founders, Yoann Demont and Mauricio Villamizar, started the company in 2017 when they identified the need to have a quiet, peaceful, and private space to take naps in the City. Prior to launching Pop & Rest, Mauricio worked in Health Tourism and Yoann in Digital Consultancy. Obviously, they are both nap lovers! 

Our live booking website:https://popnrest.com
Our blog:https://medium.com/@popnrest

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer (Intern)
jobs.description:
Hi,

Are you ready to challenge yourself? 

At Pop & Rest, we've built a platform that connects people with sleep and meditation pods allowing them to unwind, rest, and work.  

We are looking for someone to help our Lead Developer with front-end, back-end api integration, and testing. 

THE ROLE 

This is a 4-6 months paid internship that could lead to a full-time position. 

- Working alongside a product manager, UI designer, and lead web developer 
- Help develop APIs (Node.js, JSON) 
- Front-end development (Javascript, HTML5, CSS3)
- Optional: C or C# to code a hub that will enable connectivity between our smart lock and software 

ABOUT YOU

We are looking for someone who has a bit of experience from previous IT projects (app, software). If you are still studying IT, we will only accept your application if you are in your last year of study as the internship requires some solid skills. 

- Good web/software development experience 
- Good understanding of architecture and server 
- Some level of interest in IoTs, smart devices and tech startups 

WHAT WE OFFER

A programme designed to get you involved within a small creative and entrepreneurial team. You will gain new skills, enhance your portfolio, and grow as an individual. 

Other benefits include:

- Flexible hours 
- Possibility to work remotely from home (1 day per week)
- Compensation package to be discussed 
- Regular events  

GET IN TOUCH!
PLEASE NO IT AGENCY / RECRUITER / NO OUTSOURCING 

Send us your CV along with a short description. Be creative! 

Mauricio, CEO and Co-Founder

jobs.title: Real Estate Advisor (Commercial/Hospitality)
jobs.description:
Hi,

Do you have experience in the commercial and hotel industry? If you look for an advisory role alongside budding entrepreneurs, this is the place to be. 

Pop & Rest is an innovative proptech startup that provides local workers and travellers with safe spacesallowing them to unwind, rest, and work. 

As we look at our post-pandemic growth plan, we need a senior person to come on board and help us shape our service. 

**THE ROLE**

You are able to commit at least 5-7 hours per week to help our founders acquire new spaces to foster our growth. We are looking for someone that has a strong network and commercial skills. 

We're flexible on the terms for this role. 

**ABOUT YOU**

You are passionate about entrepreneurship and have either founded your own company or have held senior commercial positions in the past. 

* Proactive and like to get things done 
* Confident in providing market insights 
* Genuine interest in helping us grow our startup (not just sitting there waiting for a potential exit). 
* Not afraid of picking up the phone, driving leads, and closing deals with us 

Find out more about us and we achieved in 2019 here: 
https://medium.com/@popnrest/wow-what-a-year-it-has-been-for-pop-rest-b7545d9f0ce0  

PLEASE GET IN TOUCH!

Send us your CV along with a short description and your website/LinkedIn profile if you have one 

Mauricio, CEO
